title: Handle a Team's Protest of a Game Result
description: A team files a formal protest of a game's result, claiming a rule was misapplied by the officials on the final play.

tasks.description: Receive the formal protest from the team.
Review the official rulebook and the video of the play in question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the play and determines the officials did, in fact, misapply the rule.

tasks.description: Uphold the protest and schedule the final play of the game to be replayed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes a ruling and schedules the replay.
